channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Ceph Storage
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Ceph Storage

item.title: CVE-2019-19337|2024-08-05T02:16:46.979Z -- red%20hat -- ceph%20storage
item.description: A flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage version 3 in the way the Ceph RADOS Gateway daemon handles S3 requests. An authenticated attacker can abuse this flaw by causing a remote denial of service by sending a specially crafted HTTP Content-Length header to the Ceph RADOS Gateway server.
